Landing.h1: No Internet? No Problem. RelaySMS Keeps You Connected.
Landing.h2: RelaySMS enables users send messages to online platforms without an active internet connection. Messages are sent via SMS from your device.

auditMessage.part1: RelaySMS is committed to security and transparency. Read our

Howitworks.SubHeader: Learn how to set up and use RelaySMS for seamless offline communication.
Howitworks.Step1Desc: Download the RelaySMS App from Google PlayStore, GitHub, or build it from source. Ensure your Android device meets the technical requirements (Android 6.0+ with SMS capability).
Howitworks.Step2Desc: Create an account by clicking 'Add Account,' and filling in the required details. An authentication PIN will be sent to your phone for verification.
Howitworks.Step3Desc: Save access to platforms while connected to the internet. Add your credentials to platforms supported by RelaySMS and prepare them for offline use.
Howitworks.Step4Desc: Choose a Gateway Client for sending SMS. You can select from pre-configured clients or set up a custom client by adding the gateway number to your contacts.
Howitworks.Step5Desc: Compose messages for supported platforms without internet. Send these as SMS to a pre-saved gateway number, ensuring encrypted communication.

WhoShouldUse.Description: Anyone experiencing poor internet connectivity or living in a region prone to internet shutdowns should use RelaySMS to circumvent shutdowns and stay connected. After setting up RelaySMS on your phone, you can seamlessly send messages to your preferred online messaging platform without using any data at all (standard SMS rates will apply).

HowRelaySMSWorks.Description1: RelaySMS utilizes SMS messaging (aka "text messaging") to route offline messages back online.
HowRelaySMSWorks.Description2: The key to RelaySMS lies in its use of Gateway Clients. These devices  operate in areas with an active internet connection, allowing them to  receive an SMS message from an offline RelaySMS user and then forward it to an online server where the user has already saved their platform  permissions.

GatewayClient.Description: Setting up a gateway client allows you and anyone you share it with to send messages using your number. It's completely optional, but if you choose to set one up, just follow the instructions below.

SupportedPlatforms.Description: Send messages to these online platforms through SMS using RelaySMS, even when you don't have internet access.
SupportedPlatforms.Error: Unable to load supported platforms. Please try again later.
SupportedPlatforms.Note: More platforms are continuously being added. Stay tuned for updates!

Blog.SubHeader: Stay informed with the latest updates, tips, and stories from the RelaySMS blog.
Blog.ResilienceD: At SMSWithoutBorders, we're constantly working to improve how users stay connected even without internet access....
Blog.IDD: One of the greatest challenges of offline communication is knowing if the recipient has responded. We introduced the Bridge feature in a previous update, which enables users to communicate without saving their accounts, but are given primary aliases which act as their default RelaySMS accounts. The new feature, Replies for Bridges, enables users who send messages through Bridges to now receive replies directly via SMS.
Blog.RebrandD: SMSWithoutBorders itself is becoming the umbrella project encompassing RelaySMS and other messaging tools. The core functionality remains the same, but users can expect a new name, enhanced security features, and a focus on future growth under the SMSWithoutBorders project.
Blog.articles1: Resilience Of Gateway Clients In SMSWithoutBorders
Blog.articles2: Reliability Of Gateway Clients In Smswithoutborders

Faq.SubHeader: Find answers to the most common questions about RelaySMS and how it works.

faq1.question: When do I use RelaySMS?
faq1.answer: During times of instability (e.g., elections, protests, etc.) and other periods prone to internet shutdowns or areas with limited connectivity.

faq2.question: How does RelaySMS work?
faq2.answer: RelaySMS works by using SMS messages sent from your app to SMS Gateway clients run by volunteers, who forward them to the internet.

faq3.question: Do I need an internet connection to use RelaySMS?
faq3.answer: Once set up, you no longer need an internet connection. Messages are sent via SMS from your device.

faq4.question: Is RelaySMS available on my device?
faq4.answer: RelaySMS is currently available on Android and iOS. Linux support is coming soon.

faq5.question: I'm experiencing technical difficulties. How can I get help?
faq5.answer: Check out our Troubleshooting guide or reach out to support at developers@smswithoutborders.com.

guidelines.title: Usage Guidelines
guidelines.logoUsageText: Always maintain clear space around the logo equal to the height of the "R" in RelaySMS. Do not modify, stretch, or alter the logo proportions.
guidelines.colorVariationsText: Use the appropriate logo variant based on background color. White logos for dark backgrounds, dark logos for light backgrounds.
guidelines.attributionText: When using RelaySMS brand assets, please maintain attribution to SMSWithoutBorders and link back to our official website where appropriate.
